name: News Agency Simulator
description:
In this game you will manage a news agency. When presenting the news, you will see the sociological consequences of the decisions you make. You will have parameters to consider and you will encounter ethical dilemmas. Don't forget: Sometimes there is no right decision, there is only less wrong decision.

+ See how the media manages social movements. The Impact and Response system through news.
+ Your decisions will determine your rating and therefore your budget.
+ Buy important news from private sources with the budget you earn.
+ See the political tendency of your decisions.
+ Bonus: Fictional, black humor ads between the news to smile a little bit.
